links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (42,-659,4578,-11880)
formula: If we define f(m,j,x)=sum(binomial(m,k)*stirling2(k,j)*x^(m-k),k=j..m) then a(n-3)=f(n,3,9), (n>=3). [From _Milan Janjic_, Apr 26 2009]a(n) = 42*a(n-1) -659*a(n-2) +4578*a(n-3) -11880*a(n-4), n>=4. - Vincenzo Librandi, Mar 18 2011a(n) = 23*a(n-1) -132*a(n-2) +10^(n+1) -9^(n+1), n>=2. - Vincenzo Librandi, Mar 18 2011a(n) = 5*10^(n+2) + 2*12^(n+2)-11^(n+3)/2-3*9^(n+2)/2. - R. J. Mathar, Mar 19 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
